Posts.Content: LOVEISTHEPOWER wrote: Hello, My name is Whendi and. About six weeks ago I woke up with what I thought was a bug bit near my nipple. Im going this afternoon to have a punch biopsy done. After seeing a . nusres a General Practitioer and two Oncologists within the last ten days, I cant believe how three out of four of them just dont know.
